title: Consolidated logs - multi-app log viewing
description:
Add ability to view logs from multiple apps at once:
- `siteio apps logs --all` - Logs from all running apps
- `siteio apps logs app1 app2 ...` - Logs from multiple named apps
- Consider: `siteio logs` - Top-level command for consolidated view (apps + system)

title: Add confirmation prompt for rm commands with -y to force
description: Add interactive confirmation prompt before destructive rm commands (apps rm, sites rm). Include a -y/--yes flag to skip confirmation for scripting/automation use cases.
